src:
Live Streaming Vitoria Guimaraes vs Arsenal di Vidio
06 Nov 2019, 20:34 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal masih sempurna di grup mereka. Kemenangan atas Vitoria Guimaraes di Portugal bisa meloloskan The Gunners ke fase knockout dengan dua laga tersisa.
Arsenal akan melawat ke Portugal untuk menghadapi Vitoria Guimaraes pada matchday 4 Grup F Liga Europa 2019/20, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Pada matchday sebelumnya, Arsenal mengalahkan Vitoria secara dramatis di London dengan skor 3-2. Vitoria sempat memimpin 2-1 di babak pertama lewat gol-gol Marcus Edwards dan Bruno Duarte, yang mengapit gol Gabriel Martinelli. Arsenal memastikan kemenangan melalui dua tendangan bebas Nicolas Pepe di penghujung laga.
Arsenal memimpin klasemen sementara Grup F dengan 9 poin dari 3 pertandingan. Arsenal unggul atas Eintracht Frankfurt yang memiliki 6 poin di peringkat 2 dan Standard Liege yang punya 3 poin di posisi 3. Vitoria masih tanpa poin di tempat terbawah.
Kemenangan atas Vitoria di Portugal bisa meloloskan Arsenal ke babak 32 besar, jika Standard Liege tak menang menjamu Frankfurt di partai lainnya.
Di pertemuan sebelumnya, Arsenal sempat dibuat terkejut oleh kualitas lawan. Di kandang lawan, Arsenal harus bermain lebih fokus jika tak ingin berada dalam bahaya. Itu bisa membuka jalan bagi The Gunners untuk lolos ke putaran berikutnya.
Simak live streaming Vitoria Guimaraes vs Arsenal di bawah ini.
text:
Live Streaming of Vitoria Guimaraes vs Arsenal in Video
Nov 6, 2019, 20:34 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal are still perfect in their group. Victory over Vitoria Guimaraes in Portugal could pass the Gunners into the knockout phase with two matches remaining.
Arsenal will travel to Portugal to face Vitoria Guimaraes on Matchday 4 Group F of the 2019/20 Europa League, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
On the previous matchday, Arsenal beat Vitoria dramatically in London with a score of 3-2. Vitoria led 2-1 in the first half through goals from Marcus Edwards and Bruno Duarte, who flanked Gabriel Martinelli's goal. Arsenal sealed the win with two free kicks from Nicolas Pepe at the end of the match.
Arsenal lead the Group F standings with 9 points from 3 matches. Arsenal are ahead of Eintracht Frankfurt who have 6 points in 2nd place and Standard Liege who have 3 points in 3rd place. Vitoria is still without points at the bottom.
Victory over Vitoria in Portugal could have passed Arsenal to the last 32, if Standard Liege did not win entertaining Frankfurt in the other party.
At the previous meeting, Arsenal were made surprised by the quality of the opponent. At home opponents, Arsenal must play more focus if you do not want to be in danger. That could open the way for the Gunners to qualify for the next round.
Check out the live streaming of Vitoria Guimaraes vs Arsenal below.
